titleStmt.title: Replies made to the antiqueries of Thomas Lye, who writes himself minister of the Gospel at Chard. Wherein the parish-minsters, call, and maintenance, and divers other matters now in controversie, are handled and debated, by H.L. a friend to the people of God called Quakers.
titleStmt.author: Lavor, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Dan. White at the seven starrs in Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the seven starrs in Pauls Church-Yard
